website_summaries.verdict: Spicier and not as sweet with more carbonation than other ginger beers. 12-pack of 7.5-ounce slim cans.
pros: Spicier, more bubbles, and not as sweet as other ginger beers
A wonderful basis for superior cocktails, and served in a great number of America's very best restaurants and bars
Made in the USA by Q Drinks
No GMO's, artificial flavors, or preservatives
cons: A small percentage of buyers who purchased this tonic previously complained about  the size of the cans going from 12 ounces to 7.5 ounces for not much less money

customer_reviews.title: The new can size sucks
customer_reviews.text: I buy Q ginger ale all the the time (both online and stores) and am a huge fan of the drink itself. I was not able to get the thin long cans for a while from Amazon and was wondering what was going on. Well now I know the answer. The company switched to a smaller can (almost half the size of the original one) and the prices remain the same. I understand that they are a small company but reducing the product to half is original size and charging the same cost is not a customer centric move.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m not going to post this!
customer_reviews.text: I am not going to write how spectacular this Tonic is. I am not going to point out there is no fructose. I’m not giving up that it tastes great, is natural, is lower in calories than every brand I have tried or that it tastes great. I want to know it will be there when I order more - so Nah, you don’t want to try it or you will want more and more. I don’t play well with others.
customer_reviews.author: DrJoy

customer_reviews.title: I’m addicted
customer_reviews.text: If I could give 10 stars I would! I’ve never tasted ginger ale that actually tastes of ginger until I tried this. Spicy, crisp, wonderful! I don’t even use this as a mixer. I open the can, pop a straw in and sip sip yum yum yum.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne C.

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan--and not a replacement for the regular Q tonic
customer_reviews.text: I am not a fan of the Indian Tonic Water. I usually order the regular Q tonic and love it, but they were out. So I substituted this....that was a mistake. It is soooooo sweet--it has sugar instead of agave. I have now reordered the regular Q tonic and will mix some of this in with that just to get rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: Susannah P. Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: found less than half of product in a can
customer_reviews.text: I went to pour a G&T tonight and got the left can from the fridge (unopened). It felt very light so I got another for comparison. I then opened and poured each of them into the same sized glasses. WTF?
customer_reviews.author: hermione53

customer_reviews.title: I really love this ginger beer
customer_reviews.text: I really love this ginger beer. I’ve been using it for about six months and it’s the only ginger beer I will use for my moscow mules! Not too sweet. I liked the size of the original cans that were tall because I make pitchers of moscow mules, but the new smaller size is cute as well and good for one drink. Side note - I ordered the ginger beer and was sent the grapefruit flavor. I contacted the company and 48 hours has gone by with no response, so I dealt with it through Amazon. The flavor is really good as well but I was disappointed because I needed the ginger beer for a party.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Rinaldi

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the taste of the tonic but very, very disappointed that it had an expiration date of 7/9/19, which gives me very little time to enjoy the product over time. According to Q's own information it is good for nine months after the expiration date. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: LindaJC

customer_reviews.title: Bulging cans.
customer_reviews.text: Of the 24 cans that I purchased at over $1.00 a can 8 of them have bulging bottoms. Not sure if they are flat or will explode when opened. They cannot be returned and that is 1/3 of my product wasted.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: YUCKY, NOT FOR ME!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the nastiest tasting stuff. Really surprised I did not like it a little. I’m not a big coke drinker and I like unique drinks but Nyquil tastes better. Could be just me and this may be the normal taste for tonic water or maybe it sat in the warehouse to long. Try and find a sample first if you have no clue what this taste like. Now I have to figure out what to mix with this stuff like maybe a cup of sugar/honey because I cant waste $35!
customer_reviews.author: Debra S Gentry

customer_reviews.title: 3 out of 12 cans leaked
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how else to contact the seller, but my last order had 3 cans that leaked, each in a different box. I'm nearly out and need to order more, but I'm hesitant until I know if the seller will take any steps to correct for the loss. This is not cheap tonic made less cheap with 25 percent undrinkable.
customer_reviews.author: Tom B.

customer_reviews.title: Froze in shipment?
customer_reviews.text: Cans look like they froze in shipment. One can did explode and half of the others expanded.
customer_reviews.author: Doe

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive Advertising
customer_reviews.text: When I got my order, I realized that these can's were 7.5 once cans versus what I thought I was getting, 12 ounces. The value I thought I might be getting went out the window. The picture of the can's look like 12 but, NOT! The product ends up being much more expensive than other good brands at places like "Total Wine". Yes these taste great but it priced me out. I can't afford to purchase these as regular beverage to drink. And even If I could, I would not because I don't like to throw my money away especially when there are other less costing products.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in taste
customer_reviews.text: I just made my usual Moscow mule using this ginger beer. I took about 3 good drinks- can’t do it. It has a weird aftertaste. I just dumped my drink down the drain. It will probably be where the rest of the ginger beer goes too. Very disappointed. I’ll go back to my Goslings ginger beer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can we get regular 12oz cans please?
customer_reviews.text: I've been a fan of Q ginger beer for a long time but I am not a fan of these tiny can sizes. These new smaller can sizes are almost half the size of original 12oz soda cans while the prices remain the same. Why not sell both sizes? I can finish one of these in like two sips. Don't get me wrong, the Q ginger beer is absolutely delicious on its own or mixed to make a Moscow Mule (my favorite drink by the way) - but I wish they wouldn't skimp out on their product by fitting them in tiny 7.5oz cans!
customer_reviews.author: ap619

customer_reviews.title: Buying by the case has economic advantages
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased by the case and delivered without any damage to the cans. I've compared it with several other high-end tonics and honestly can't tell much of a difference between them and certainly not when mixed with gin or vodka. What I particularly like about Q Mixers is the product comes in environmentally friendly cans. We don't recycle glass in this area so Q is definitely my "go to" choice. The tonic has a solid, slightly bitter taste - enough to know the tonic has enough quinine for taste. Additionally, the product is sweetened with organic agave and not high fructose corn syrup. Go for quality - Go for Q!
customer_reviews.author: Analytical Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Q....size convenience from the best
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy quality liquor and noticed it seemed to be ruined when I added mixers. After reading the labels, it was apparent. This is how I found Q. Smooth, seamless and addictive....I use nothing less. My friends are all now devoted Q users. If I had a concern, it was about the sizing. The bottles were great for parties, but too much for an after work cocktail....then my husband asked me to search for the 7.5.....holy smokers, here it is. Immediate order and cannot wait until it rolls to Amazon subscribe and save so I do not have to think about it. As it relates to the quality and taste, order it once...you will ask why you waited.
customer_reviews.author: Yola

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of Fever Tree tonics but saw this come up and after reading the description I decided to give it a shot. I like to focus on natural ingredients. While it arrived promptly, I was disappointed with how 'tame' the flavor is. Does very little to enrich the mixed drink experience. I do not want a tonic that overpowers all the other ingredients, but this one is gone to the low end of flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos R. Solis

customer_reviews.title: Too much carbonation
customer_reviews.text: This has been my go-to tonic for the past year and I would normally give it five stars however I've recently had two bad batches - you flip the tab on the top of the can and the contents immediately overflow the container, getting your hand wet with the tonic as well as any surface beneath the can at the time of opening. Needless to say, I now open my tonic cans only over the kitchen sink. Other than this, they're perfect! They just need to get their carbonation experts and quality control people to look at this problem. I may have to switch if it's not fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tonic water and a great value
customer_reviews.text: A good gin and tonic deserves good gin, but it also deserves much better than the mainstream tonic water that's full of high fructose corn syrup. Q makes excellent tonic water, and I'm really enjoying this new flavor! The cans are sized perfectly to put ice and a measure of gin in a pint glass and fill it up with tonic water. The packaging gets a 4/5 because the four-pack cardboard boxes are so well sealed that they're a little more challenging to open than I'd prefer, but when I'm motivated I seem to manage. Have bought repeatedly and will buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H. Anbinder

customer_reviews.title: I miss the 12oz cans
customer_reviews.text: This is for the Ginger Beer, which I'm disclaiming because Amazon appears to lump all the miscellaneous mixers from Q Tonic together. Which sucks. Anyway, the Q Tonic Ginger Beer: I like this straight-up, on its own. It's has such a strong, spicy kick that makes it sublime for sipping all by itself. I love ginger beer for the kick, and you don't need much of this get a good spicy kick in the mouth. As opposed to, say, Goslings or Bundaberg that's more sweet than spicy. I'm just disappointed I can't get it in a 12oz can anymore. Q discontinued 12oz cans a year or two ago, so I'm just left with these mini 7.5oz cans. :(
customer_reviews.author: R.B. Michael

customer_reviews.title: Pour over ice for a great "summer" cooler, !!! .
customer_reviews.text: There are several brands of "Ginger Beer" widely available, in stores, however, this is the first one, (I've seen,) that claims to be "solely", a mixer, ( for rum, Gin and, vodka, drinks, !!!) . The beverage itself, is alcohol free, !!!, and comes in "7.5", oz. cans, ( snuggly, wrapped in "4" packs, and You get a total of 3, 4, - packs, for less than $12.00, !!! . Thats just "under" $1.00, dollar, per 7.5, oz. can, and it is an absolutely, "delicious" beverage, (ALL by itself, !!!) . And, it is, "spicier", than other brands I've tasted, !!! .
customer_reviews.author: Rex Gettman

customer_reviews.title: Not good mixer! Bad taste and horrible after-taste.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible with alcohol, tried with several types, gin, vodka, rum, whisky, the taste of stringent. I even tried to mix with Kool-Aid, Lemonade, and fruit juice to get my moneys worth and drink and still could not cancel out the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Boxer615_TN

customer_reviews.title: Great Gingerale
customer_reviews.text: I love organic soft drinks with a naturally lower sugar level. I have bought these at my local grocery store, and just drunk them as Ginger Ale as I do not drink alcohol. I did not realize they were mixers until I saw them advertised this way on Amazon. I did get them because I think they are delicious, and it is easier to buy more here than at my local grocery.
customer_reviews.author: gwendolyn

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely phenomenal company and fantastic tonic water
customer_reviews.text: Q makes some serious quality mixers and they definitely have your back. Every product I've had of theirs knocks it out of the park for me -- especially their tonic waters. This elderflower tonic water is just the bees knees and a nice mix up from my usual for my gin & tonics. Q's mixers have trucked me through the quarantine and are keeping me going through the pandemic -- A+ company and A+ product.
customer_reviews.author: dante

customer_reviews.title: 'Cause we're all drinking more at home
customer_reviews.text: OMG, I'm ordering drink mixers on Amazon Pantry now. They are extremely handy as you can finish the can in one drink, so no left-over half-flat tonic in the fridge. Another bonus is they don't make as much noise as glass bottles when you put them in the recycle; the neighbors don't need to know!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great Club Soda!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy vodka with club soda and this club soda is perfect! I love that it has no strange or artificial ingredients. It's surprising how hard it can be to find that in stores. When I'm not drinking margaritas and want to behave myself - to a degree - I put a salt rim on a cup, add ice, vodka and Q club soda and I'm all set. I highly recommend this clean ingredient club soda.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, healthier alternative to mainstream club sodas
customer_reviews.text: We have multiple food allergies, including corn, which makes baking quite challenging. I found several recipes that were allergen-free, except that I needed club soda. I didn't think a corn-free club soda was available, but thankfully, I searched the Internet to see what was possible. Finding Q Club Soda was a godsend. Not only can we use it for baking breads and cakes, but we can also make safe, fun fruit punches for our children, which they enjoy at parties.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rotten packing job
customer_reviews.text: The box the cans were shipped in had packing on only two of six sides to protect from damage. All of the cans are horribly twisted and misshapen. None were pierced, but almost all of them are badly damaged. I had planned to buy this often, but I'd rather pay a little more to get undamaged goods. And I'm annoyed that I have no option to contact the seller about this. Perhaps they have a setting to control whether they hear about dissatisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Percy

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is soooo delish!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I rarely review things, but... This stuff is really really tasty. I totally get the "we wanted to make mixers not soda pops" philosophy. But this stuff is delicious alone, to boot! Even though I can get this at my local Bevmo or Liquor Store, it's more economical to purchase through Amazon. Did I mention that I LOVE Amazon? So, yes, I love the Q mixers and Amazon. There, I said it. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Amy Showalter

customer_reviews.title: Much healthier than the well known brands
customer_reviews.text: I like that they don't use crap to make this ginger ale. It's sweetened with agave and it has a true Ginger flavor. Probably because they actually use ginger. I have tried the ginger beer before but prefer this because it's a little less 'peppery' but both are good.
customer_reviews.author: HerGrooviness

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of this stuff. It is absolutely perfect for Moscow Mules. I find that one can makes two 1.5 ounce cocktails. Compared to other brands, the sugar / calorie count is lower. Can't go wrong there. Flavor is bold, but not overly spicy like some brands. At roughly $1 a can, it's not a cheap mixer. But a little goes a long way. This has become one of my regular subscribe and save items.
customer_reviews.author: Reagan

customer_reviews.title: This order...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and buy some of the others. Today I received my order for the cola. It was evident when I opened the box that there was a leak from at least 1 can. I discovered I had 1 empty can, another almost empty and 1 leaking that was almost full. Not sure if this happened at the packaging warehouse or not. I feel I should get at least those 3 replaced. This isn’t your cheap soda.
customer_reviews.author: Trudie

customer_reviews.title: Grapefruit Never Tasted So Good
customer_reviews.text: While at a conference my colleague suggested that we have a cocktail with dinner. The waiter suggested this for me. No alcohol added however he added raspberries in the glass. I was in love. I couldn't finish my dinner because I was definitely not going to leave my drink. I searched the nearby stores and couldn't find it so I search my old trustful and true Amazon. This drink is quite pricey but I'm worth it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Willis

customer_reviews.title: A good drink deserves a great mixer.
customer_reviews.text: I'd never have thought twice about mixers had I not tried Q tonic over the summer. No HFCS, just a bit of sweetness, and great quinine flavor! Note to Amazon, if these are read by the staff - the packaging was off-base. The compact box of 12 cans of mixer was in a much larger cardboard box. There must be another box that could have more closely fit the inner one. Alternatively, just put a shipping label directly on the inner box and call it done.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Crushed shipment, leaking cans...of very, TOO, sweet ginger beer.
customer_reviews.text: The taste isn't too great, more sweet than I'd like, but the worst part was the delivery = 5 cans were crushed and leaking therefore creating a very soggy box and shipment. The cans that weren't busted to the point of leaking were still very warped and smashed. Out of the entire shipment, I had 4 undamaged cans of product. A bit disappointed in both flavor and how this arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra $$$.
customer_reviews.text: After buying plastic liters of club soda at the grocery store and usually throwing half of it out after it lost fizz I was turned onto Q Club Soda. Not only is it nice to not throw out un-fizzy half-used soda, this soda tastes WAY better with my tequila. We order at least one or two cases a month, we're officially spoiled and will only use Q Club in our mixed drinks. We buy both the bottles and cans, they come perfectly packed and without damage.
customer_reviews.author: ksquared

customer_reviews.title: Love this tonic water - usually you say ‘tonic water’ ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this tonic water - usually you say ‘tonic water’ without expecting anything but the usual. Thought I’d try this one and was greatly surprised how wonderful it was all by itself. It’s great as a mixer too - probably the best tonic water i had ever had.
customer_reviews.author: SO

customer_reviews.title: Kick in the pants Ginger Ale!
customer_reviews.text: As stated right on the can, this is SPECTACULAR, and by far, the best Ginger Ale ever (tastes like Ginger Beer, says my husband). I first saw a four-pack of this hiding on the top shelf at Whole Foods, and I said, "Why not?" I just had to try it, and it was so worth it. This package came with a postcard showing all flavors of mixers with a personalized note from the Founder. Nice touch. I hope this company thrives for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: TOO spicy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because they were out of stock of ginger ale. Big mistake! The ale is a bit much, but this is ridiculous. Couldn't even talk after 2 drinks. Very sad because i drink it for nausea which i get often from migraines Purchase the ginger ale instead
customer_reviews.author: TxTeaTime

customer_reviews.title: Very good tonic water but not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Much better than your run of the mill tonic water. While it’s lower cost than other premium competitors, I prefer the british premium brand even though it costs more. This is still a very good tonic and much better than regular store stuff.
customer_reviews.author: GR

customer_reviews.title: close to real ginger ale
customer_reviews.text: This is as close to real ginger ale that I've seen since my last Blenheim. Side-by-side comparison with Canada Dry showed how bad the super-sweet CD has gotten.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: one of the best flavors EVER
customer_reviews.text: Ambrosia from the gods. Like throat burning magic. No need to mix, just drink it as it is. I love it!!! I don't drink alcohol, so I only drink this straight. I usually get Goya ginger beer, or a Jamaican brand, like D&G - but Q is my new favorite. Too bad it is so expensive. It's like 3 or 4 times the price of my other favorites, when you compare ounce to ounce. But it is the best tasting, by far.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Too much
customer_reviews.text: My fault for not bothering to read the size of the can. I assumed they would be the usual and thought they were kind of pricey at that size. But I love that they are made with agave sweetener and sometimes I just want a coke that does not have diet aftertaste or full of refined sugar. This fits the bill. The taste is good. I hope other companies start using agave in their sodas, it might bring the price down.
customer_reviews.author: J. waldhalm

customer_reviews.title: Delicious ginger beer!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking a ginger beer to satisfy a Moscow Mule craving when I stumbled upon this brand at our local Kroger. I like that it said it was not a sweet ginger beer. I tried this in my Mule and my husband had it in a Jameson and ginger beer cocktail. We were both impressed with the flavor. It has a lovely, spicy ginger bite and lightly sweet, not cloying. It is surely not the cheapest you can buy, but I would say the flavor speaks for itself.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tomlin

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FLAVOR, LOW IN SUGAR
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of ginger, so when ginger beers hit the US market in a big way, that is, to use as mixers, I tried many. The worst part was the amount of sugar, plus certain brands add odd flavors, masking the ginger and certainly not good for mixers. Q is my dream brand! The ginger pops! Few ingredients, plus lower in sugar. On Weight Watchers, 4 oz is 3 points! I’m happy to support this company with a shoutout, their products are outstanding!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great on it's own and puts a kick in a ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Q Ginger Beer for over a year now via Amazon. It's a must-have in my house. The taste of ginger, cardamom, coriander and chili pepper is incredible together and low in sugar is a plus. Great on it's own and puts a kick in a Moscow Mule. Cheeerrrzzz.
customer_reviews.author: Priya Hansraj

customer_reviews.title: Good but potent
customer_reviews.text: Delicious, BUT if you're like me with stomach issues, Acid Reflux and ulcers, there is hot 🌶️ CHILI PEPPER and Strong Ginger in this and adds fuel to the fire. 🔥 Also contains carbonated water, Agave, Citric Acid, Orange, Rose Oil, Coriander, Ginger Extract, and other ingredients too blurry to read. 14Grams sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Incubus-Nihilist

customer_reviews.title: THE. BEST. Ginger Beer!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this Ginger Beer to EVERYONE! It makes the BEST Moscow mules! I love the subtle kick you get from it.. The small can size is perfect for one mixed drink. Don’t forget your real lime! I have ordered twelve packs twice with no issues. Next day delivery, and the packaging is extremely secure for these delicate items. Only thing I wish is that there would be a case instead of just the 4 packs!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth

customer_reviews.title: The best Ginger ale and beer out there
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this a few years ago at Walmart and it became my favorite ginger ale. I haven’t been able to find in a while, although I found the ginger beer in Target. It sold out quickly. Both are delicious with REAL ingredients. Not the artificial crap that’s in the big brands. They are spicy!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Lacks Flavor, and Possibly Lacks Quinine
customer_reviews.text: I'm on doctor's orders to drink tonic water due to jitters and muscle cramping in my left hand. I'd tried other tonic waters with success, but I wanted to see if these less-expensive cans might work. Nope. Not only do they lack a good quinine flavor, my cramping started coming back after a couple days of drinking this. They'd probably work in a gin and tonic, but that's not what I'm using them for. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Does bulging can mean botulism?
customer_reviews.text: I never had this problem before but after I chugged down a can of ginger beer I realized the bottom of it was bulging! I looked at the rest and several cans have this problem. I took microbiology and in that class I was told that a bulging can is due to bacteria and improper sealing. Long story short I hope I don't end up in the hospital or dead....
customer_reviews.author: issa

customer_reviews.title: great ginger beer
customer_reviews.text: Love the flavor of this. I love the product. it's lower in sugar and has no high fructose corn syrup in it which is what I look for mostly these days. I like the big bottle better, but the cans are good, if smaller. Wish I could find them locally, but i love that you are always ready to send me a package!!
customer_reviews.author: Sl

customer_reviews.title: Bulging cans across multiple cases.
customer_reviews.text: Cans frequently look undamaged, other than bulging bottoms. So much so, that when you set the can on a counter, they wobble like a top about to fall instead of resting flat. This has occurred across multiple packages of 4 cans.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Good price, Packaged well
customer_reviews.text: Good price & packaged well. Came quickly and was as described. Product itself had a bad taste, did not like. Strong quinine bitter taste, over powers the gin & tonic
customer_reviews.author: TPH

customer_reviews.title: Delicious but bit expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Clean, clear and crisp. By far the best ginger beer I’ve ever tasted. No after taste whatsoever. A bit on the expensive side, but worth it, I think. Treat yourself to this excellent ginger beer, at least occasionally. If you like ginger beer, you might find it hard to resist as a regular thing. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: BALFOUR

customer_reviews.title: When you use high quality gin, you need high quality tonic water -- this is it!
customer_reviews.text: I like the 7.5 oz. cans because it is just the right size for a tall G&T. Anything bigger and my tonic would probably be flat by the time I get to the bottom of the can. I was looking for a quality tonic water with a good measure of quinine in it to go with Tanqueray (without lime thank you.)
customer_reviews.author: HowdyDave

customer_reviews.title: Q grapefruit cocktail - The Who Dat.
customer_reviews.text: I’m sold on Q tonic for my G&Ts so I wanted to try their grapefruit soda. The only recipes I could find online contained tequila..... which is not my cup of tea-quila lol. After celebrating my beloved Saint’s win I decided it was time to play bartender and put to good use the Q grapefruit soda. Mix one shot of cucumber vodka with a Q grapefruit soda with plenty of ice and you’ll have yourself something that tastes like a jolly rancher watermelon candy. Go figure. It’s delicious. Who dat!!!!
customer_reviews.author: penny devries

customer_reviews.title: Real Ginger in this Ginger Ale . Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Real Ginger Ale. It tastes like Ginger Ale is supposed to. My Mom needs it for her queasy tummy and other brands with ginger flavoring aren’t helpful... this one is
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Horribly strong
customer_reviews.text: I love a good mule, and thought I would try this ginger beer. To say it is strong is an understatement... WOW, I can't even breathe before I take a drink or the 'spiciness' hits me. Choking on almost ever drink taken. If you like a strong, very strong, ginger flavor, this is for you... otherwise, stick with what you know.
customer_reviews.author: KristieM

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY recommend (with my tip to fix flavor)
customer_reviews.text: My doc recommended this for restless leg syndrome. The taste was awful, so I added some of the water enhancer I use with my Soda Stream & OMG it was the fizziest, bestest soda I've had in YEARS!!!!! Even a child would love & it has tenfold less sugar & such that regular soda's have! I HIGHLY recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: MissD

customer_reviews.title: Cannot match Canada Dry club soda
customer_reviews.text: Not much fizz. the fizz fizzles out just as fast that it takes to open a can. The product can never match the best of club soda's, Canada dry, and the second flaw is, considering that this club soda is not at the top of consumer satisfactory acceptance, is the senseless excessive over the top selling price. Continuing that Amazon has a chronic excessive and unfair selling structure and now that we are facing a Corona pandemic, runaway out of price pricing is starting on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: gejome

customer_reviews.title: Taste is out of this world
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this ginger ale. So does my husband. It is perfectly brewed; and not sickly sweet. It is the perfectly sized can for one serving.
customer_reviews.author: Mother Pearl

customer_reviews.title: I made a mistake .
customer_reviews.text: The first time I tasted this drink I gave it a bad review. Sorry I was too quick to make a comment. I love it and ordered more. I am now adding an additional comment. I am addicted to this drink. It is wonderful and refreshing I have ordered multiple times since I first wrote the review..
customer_reviews.author: Ed's Girl

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Tonic Water
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy gin and tonic made with Q Tonic. It is lightly sweetened with agave syrup, so not too sweet and has a light herbaceous taste of quinine. I gave it four stars because for the same price, approximately, they used to sell a can that was perfect for my husband and I both to enjoy a G&T, now the can is much smaller and I feel slightly cheated but it is what is. Expensive tonic water that tastes good.
customer_reviews.author: K. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Seriously the best
customer_reviews.text: This is my FAVORITE ginger beer. It's the perfect flavor, the ideal bubbles, and just the right amount of "snap" of ginger. I mostly use these as mixers for drinks - typically whiskey. But I also think it's a great drink for when you have tummy troubles or are feeling nauseous!
customer_reviews.author: Bookapotamus

customer_reviews.title: Incredible flavor
customer_reviews.text: Incredible flavor! I love ginger ale. I grew up with Vernor’s and Canada Dry, both of which I no long drink because they use too much sugar and their diet versions leave a lot to be desired. Q Ginger Ale is excellent. 60 calories per can and the bite of the ginger is exquisitely biting! I am subscribing !
customer_reviews.author: M. Brough

customer_reviews.title: Ginger Ale for everyone
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ginger ale for everyone. Even for people that do not drink alcohol. The only two things that I would change is to have them in at lest 12oz. And to have them in glass.
customer_reviews.author: Haney

customer_reviews.title: leg cramps
customer_reviews.text: It instantly stops cramps in my legs, toes, and feet. When I get a cramp I run to the fridge and grab a can to drink down fast. It works
customer_reviews.author: kellb

customer_reviews.title: Pretty in pink. Or not.
customer_reviews.text: I love these small cans of grapefruit juice. They are the perfect size for a Paloma and not too sweet like other juices. My only "complaint" is that of the four packs I recently purchased, the juice in two of them were a beautiful pink color and the other two are nearly clear. I don't want added artificial coloring but I have to say I was a bit disappointed that my pretty summer drink wasn't the pink color I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Book Worm

customer_reviews.title: Best ginger drink
customer_reviews.text: I never had ginger beer before. Probably in alcoholic drinks. I'm not well versed! But i am now with this ginger beer! Smooth and fresh! Very strong ginger taste! I enjoy with everything ( rhum Barbancour, Ciroc etc...) and as a cold drink! Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Indy

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor, Great bubbles, great price!!
customer_reviews.text: I tend to be very picky about my tonic water and was a little hesitant to try Q Elderflower but finally took the plunge. WOW. Less expensive but the flavor ad bubbles are outstanding! So happy I stepped outside my comfort zone and tried a new brand!!
customer_reviews.author: Dena Miller

customer_reviews.title: Damaged in shipment
customer_reviews.text: Tonic water tastes very good, but not good price wise. Out of 24 cans, 9 were damaged (crushed). Of those, two were open. Product had been repacked somewhere in the Amazon shipping flow. Will not purchase through mail-order again.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick walsh

customer_reviews.title: get your ginger on
customer_reviews.text: These things are great for mixing and making cocktails with friends or by yourself. This is also the way I found out I don't like Moscow Mules. Not my cup of vodka. Still great to have on hand because I have plenty of friends that like them.
customer_reviews.author: Test1234a

customer_reviews.title: Sent me wrong water won't allow me to return
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong flavor of water and found out j can not return this. What a RIP off!
customer_reviews.author: Shieye

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: I am a tonic water snob, but quite enjoy this brand. LOVE the one-drink cans! While I can definitely get into more than one drink, when one is enough, I hate tossing out half a can of tonic, so these smaller cans are great, and store easily.
customer_reviews.author: Movin' southTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Believe the reviews!  This tastes amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT tasting Ginger Beer. We have had varieties from all over and this one is top notch. I initially wished the cans were bigger, but it ended up being the perfect serving size. Love this! Will definitely buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly smooth tonic water
customer_reviews.text: We like Hendricks or Bombay Sapphire for our G & T. Previous commercial tonic water with high fructose corn syrup left a bad after taste and masked the flavor of the gin. This is so smooth we enjoy it as a beverage on the rocks. But it really makes a G & T something to remember. Thanks for a great product. Received in a sturdy box, no damage, we love the little cans. Just enough for a drink and a 'freshener' so it's sized properly.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Chianti

customer_reviews.title: Cute cans and great flavor
customer_reviews.text: Got on a gin-and-tonic kick for spring and this stuff is great so we added it to our subscription list. Not too sweet, great with fancy gin, and we love the small cans; were tired of larger bottles of Fever Tree going flat in the fridge. A couple of times we’ve had a case arrive with a leaky can or two; c’est la guerre.
customer_reviews.author: Nicefellow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ginger beer
customer_reviews.text: My friend recommended this ginger beer brand because it is not overly sweet. I like it alot and have used it to make Moscow mule cocktails using strawberry/watermelon. The package came in very fast and nicely packaged. I would order again!
customer_reviews.author: The Vo House

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: These have no taste, my gin and tonic tastes like fizzy gin. Cheap supermarket brand is 10x better.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Fevertree makes a way better product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because Fever Tree's Elderflower tonic was getting expensive and hard to find. Q-tonic is a leading high end tonic manufacturer and they competes with Fever Tree. Given the similarities between them I though it would be a comparable product like Coke/Pepsi. long story short, if your buying this to compare to Fever Tree's Elederflower Tonic water then you probably shouldn't even waste your time. Q-Edlerflower Tonic taste chemically and bitter where as the Fever tree tastes like some one made a fresh herb infused tonic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good ginger beer, but....
customer_reviews.text: When we opened the box, it was soggy and wet inside. This was shipped with no packing material, and there are 3 empty cans, injured and empty. The ginger beer is good.
customer_reviews.author: Yimji Wills

customer_reviews.title: excellent, all natural
customer_reviews.text: I like the natural ingredients and the wonderful flavors. Summer Gin and Tonics are now much healthier, and taste wonderful. I also tried the Ginger Beer, and this is the best I've ever tried. The Ginger has a lot of smack and it isn't overly sweet as most ginger beers are. Love this. Fast service. Well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: finnridge

customer_reviews.title: Good for belly ache & inflammation
customer_reviews.text: My meds make my stomach upset. Ginger is a natural anti-inflammatory. These really help. Taste great. 80 calories and only 20 ng of sodium.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy Alexandeer

customer_reviews.title: The new small cans are not the same
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved the grapefruit flavor and the key word is loved as she no longer like the taste of the new small cans. I do not understand when companies have to mess with a great product but they did and lost our sales.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like watered-down tonic water
customer_reviews.text: The flavor just isn't there. I really enjoy the Fever Tree tonic waters - they are flavorful, complex and delicious. Q Tonic, on the other hand, tastes like someone tried to stretch the batch by diluting it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Rich

customer_reviews.title: Best quality I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Simply the highest quality I’ve ever tasted! I’m not a member of the obnoxious food/drink police, but the difference in quality between Q mixers and anything else is amazing. I do t serve my guests (or myself) cheap booze, so why kill a mixed drink with high fructose corn syrup mixers that don’t have real ingredients? SO worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Dasher

customer_reviews.title: Ginger Beer with a little Kick
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize that chili pepper was in ginger beer. Now I do and a Lot of brands add it. I cannot even deal with much ground pepper on food. They arrived nicely packed in a very timely manor during the gifting season. Customer Service was outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecky1962

customer_reviews.title: I love Q Tonic
customer_reviews.text: I love Q Tonic. It tastes so much better than the high fructose, corn syrup tonics on the shelves of supermarkets. I would give 5 stars, except they seem to have discontinued the 12 oz. cans which are much more economical. Also, I used to be able to buy this tonic, in cans, at my local supermarket and it has disappeared for the last 6 months or so. Please bring back the 12 oz. cans. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer#13

customer_reviews.title: I didn't receive LIGHT ginger beer
customer_reviews.text: I love the Q Mixers LIGHT Ginger Beer so added this sometimes hard to find item to my Subscribe and Save. The first month I did receive the correct item and really enjoyed the product. My second order delivered the regular Q Mixers Ginger Beer, not the LIGHT version. I requested a return and they said they would ship out the correct item. Once again I received the regular version not the LIGHT. I will probably remove from Subscribe and Save if I cannot get the exact item I have subscribed to.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Clean crisp flavor that lets better spirits shine.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these tonics for many years. They have a clean more subtle taste that I love and that does not obscure better spirits. If you are looking for sweet and highly carbonated then these are not for you. I no longer drink supermarket tonic, but instead purchase these in bulk from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kevmo

customer_reviews.title: just the way I like my Ginger beer
customer_reviews.text: Sharp and strong...just the way I like my Ginger beer. The initial flavor, however, doesn't last to the bottom of the can. It's like the good ginger flavor all rises to the top and once you take the first few sips, its just another average ginger flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Lessa

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Paloma
customer_reviews.text: For a Paloma (tequila, grapefruit, and lime) that is more refined and less cloying, this is the perfect mixer. 1-1/2 (or 2) ozs of tequila, a squeeze of lime, and a can of this grapefruit soda over ice is summertime in a glass.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Great as mixer
customer_reviews.text: Love this spicy ginger beer. The small can is perfect to use as a mixer (I use with whiskey so good!!) I like a spicy ginger beer and this is everything I like in a small can just right for single use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Alternative to Regular Tonic !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Q Mixers because they are a healthy alternative to regular mixes. And the flavor of the mixers is no different than the flavor of the regular unhealthy mixers out there in the marketplace. I have purchased the Indian Tonic, the Regular Tonic, the Light Tonic, the Grapefruit, and the Kola; I have been extremely satisfied with every single flavor so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m addicted
customer_reviews.text: If I could give 10 stars I would! I’ve never tasted ginger ale that actually tastes of ginger until I tried this. Spicy, crisp, wonderful! I don’t even use this as a mixer. I open the can, pop a straw in and sip sip yum yum yum.
customer_reviews.author: Bertha Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great. Love that my kids can drink it.
customer_reviews.text: Simple ingredients that taste great. I don't like my kids drinking soda. It's terrible. This ginger ale is healthy and a hit!
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Delivery problem
customer_reviews.text: My box arrived damaged because it was soaked--I thought someone left it out in the rain, but it was because so many cans exploded. Not much flavor in the cans that had not blown up, perhaps because they lost pressure? Not sure if I can get a refund; otherwise, an expensive experiment.
customer_reviews.author: Book Conspirator

customer_reviews.title: Case half empty cans and flat soda
customer_reviews.text: I get 2 cases a month through amazon. But this order literally one of the cases the cans had only half a can and the soda was flat. Going to try it one more time,if it happens again, will cancel
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Too strong
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered many times but never these small cans thought I would try them. Wellll, they are so peppery I can’t swallow without gagging and sneezing. TERRIBLE"."...
customer_reviews.author: Eliza McDowell

product_meta.title: Q Mixers Ginger Beer, Premium Cocktail Mixer, 7.5 oz (12 Cans)
product_meta.description:
Flavor:Ginger Beer| Size:7.5 Fl Oz (Pack of 12)Made with Organic Agave and real Ginger, Q Ginger Beer has a fresh, bold flavor with a smooth sweetness that brings out the best in your vodka, rum, or whiskey. Perfectly carbonated so your drink will never lose its fizz, Q Ginger Beer is spicy, more carbonated and less sweet so it complements, not overpowers your spirit.

Make your drink spectacular
feature_bullets: Q Mixers Ginger Beer has a fresh, bold flavor with a smooth sweetness that brings out the best in your vodka, rum, or whiskey
Made with real ingredients like ginger and Organic Agave
No artificial flavors, no High Fructose Corn Syrup
From Brooklyn, made in the USA

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
